category: English Rose - bred by David Austin
name: Vanessa Bell
description: Pink-tinged buds open to medium-sized cups held in large clusters. Pale yellow, paling to white at the edges; each with a rich yellow eye. The fragrance is similar to green Tea with aspects of lemon and honey. It forms a bushy, upright shrub. Named for the artist, designer and founder member of the Bloomsbury Group - sister of the writer, Virginia Woolf. David Austin, 2017.
